name: Slava Drone
description:
Instructions

Move your drone with arrow keys.

Press Z to drop a bomb.

Judge the wind speed and watch for orcs firing up at you.

Take out orcs to collect more bombs and batteries.

Help Ukraine...

Buy official merch here or donate direct to my friend's campaign

Also, I will buy DJI drones and send to Ukraine if I earn enough :)

Thank you, and Slava Ukraine
